title: Watch the NA LCS at a Viewing Party in D.C. this Saturday!

replies.body: {{item:3070}} i fear i may have seen this too late... i live only like 3 blocks away and it seems full
Was this even in the news feed? I wish it was if it wasn't, would have liked to check this out!  Oh well.
Dang, the one weekend I'm out of town. Hope you guys have more!
